headline: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks That Could Soar in the Second Half of 2025
summary: The tariff-driven stock market sell-off has put the indexes into a correction phase, hitting artificial intelligence (AI) stocks hard.  Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) and The Trade Desk (NASDAQ: TTD) are two stocks that are well positioned to experience such a recovery.  Initially, playing second fiddle to Nvidia in the AI accelerator market and the massive revenue declines in AMD's gaming and embedded segments hit this stock hard.
